name: Intro
_source: speak;Marisa;Finally. That took us long enough.
speak;Reimu;Maybe we would've gotten here sooner if *someone* just stayed down.
speak;Youmu;I was serving her lunch before I left to patrol.
speak;Youmu;She also mentioned having to take care of some urgent business.
speak;Marisa;Your boss being busy? That's rare.
speak;Youmu;Lady Yuyuko is always hard at work...|Though I wish she were always hard at work *more*.
speak;Yuyuko;Oh? We have visitors?|You didn't tell me, Youmu.
speak;Yuyuko;Who did you think it was? A ghost?
speak;Yuyuko;Anyways, are you all here to see the cherry blossoms?|I don't think they're in season.
speak;Marisa;We're here to draft you into Gensokyo's Liberation Front!
speak;Youmu;That seriously can't be you guys' name.;;;thought_bubble
speak;Reimu;And we won't take no for an-|Huh, that was easy.
speak;Youmu;Lady Yuyuko, with all due respect...|What are you thinking?
speak;Yuyuko;I always wanted to go on another day trip!|It gets boring here sometimes.
speak;Reimu;Now hold on a second!|We aren't going anywhere just yet!
speak;Reimu;I'm not heading right back out after finally managing to get here.
speak;Yuyuko;Oh, you want to stay for the night? You could have just asked.|I even booked the Prismrivers for tonight!
speak;Lyrica;Huh? So you guys did book us after all?
speak;Marisa;In the middle of a war?
speak;Lyrica;You know what? This isn't the strangest job we've taken.|Just tell us where to set up.
speak;Yuyuko;I'll go prepare some tea for later.|Make yourselves at home.
speak;Marisa;Ah! Looks like things are finally looking up for once!
speak;Youmu;But Lady Yuyuko, I could've sworn we never booked any concerts for tonight.
speak;Yuyuko;Oh, Youmu. That's because we didn't.
speak;Yuyuko;We're expecting more guests later tonight.|Let's make sure we greet them properly.
speak;Kasen;Hmm, this is a really strong brew.
speak;Marisa;I think I watched you down five of those in the past ten minutes.
speak;Reimu;Yeah, didn't you tell us way back to "mind our drinking habits"?
speak;Kasen;This is mainly to be polite.
speak;Reimu;I'm just glad to get a break.|Beating up people gets tiring after a while.
speak;Reimu;Hey, aren't you going to stay up for the concert tonight?
speak;Marisa;Ah, right. I almost forgot with all this booze...
speak;Marisa;Phew, maybe I had too much...
speak;Reimu;Ngh... hey... I'm suddenly feeling sick.
speak;Kasen;Hey, is everything alright, you two?!
speak;Kasen;Hey, what are you standing there for?!
speak;Mima2;Well, I'll be! Guess that laser beam of yours really is compensating for something.
speak;Mima2;Did you *really* believe that wandering spirit act?|Do you think all those people you faced to get here were just coincidence?
speak;Kasen;So it was you all along!? You're not human!
speak;Mima2;Gee, it doesn't take a genius to see that~.
speak;Mima2;Anyways, I don't want to keep you too long, so let's get to the point~.
speak;;You should really cover your tracks better, you know~.
speak;Mima2;Oh, more people, just what I-
speak;Mima2;Hmph, I should've known you'd wouldn't have been a total idiot.
speak;Yuyuko;Fufu. I'll take that as a compliment~.
speak;Mima2;Tch, no matter. You are only delaying the inevitable anyways.
speak;Kasen;So, you knew she was a traitor?
speak;Yuyuko;It's always a good idea to weed out any potential ones.
speak;Kasen;Well, what about the current situation then?|That spirit is definitely not alone.
speak;Yuyuko;A concert makes for a good muster point, wouldn't you say?
speak;Reimu;Agh. When I get my hands on that spirit, I swear-
speak;Kasen;Easy... can you two stand properly?
speak;Kasen;We should probably join with the others then.|This place is going to turn into a battlefield.
speak;Yuyuko;I should go and greet my new guests too! It's only polite.
speak;Reimu;Unbelievable. And I thought we were done for the day.
speak;Reimu;Hey, Marisa? Aren't we gonna tag along?
speak;Reimu;Don't just stand there, come on.
speak;Reimu;Ground control to Marisa! We need to go, now!!
